Reviews.Title: “Helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: milaheda
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the hotel facing the fact that requesting 2 rooms with a connecting door was not available at that time, we passed the 1st night by split room. 2nd day I asked to have a possibility for connecting door, found out that hotel staff will do best to arrange new rooms with a connecting door later, suprisingly when return to the hotel all our baggages have been transfer to the new rooms (upgraded). We pleased to remain at the hotel until the last 4 days.

Reviews.Title: “cool seaview”
Reviews.Author: Ondrej K
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay at Novotel very much. Came at night and did not know where I was. Surprise surprise in the morning! Pretty cool seaview. The hotel staff is very helpful! Something you rarely see in the rest of Europe.

Reviews.Title: “a wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: leanners
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here over Valentines Day and it was a brilliant decision. The staff are friendly and very helpful and the food in the hotel restaurant was the best I have ever eaten. The fact that the hotel is some distance from the centre was not a problem at all- the shuttle service was efficient and reliable and a taxi from the centre only cos about 7 pounds. The room was clean, comfortable and warm as was the bathroom. As it was February and the weather wasn't great we did not use the pool, but I should imagine that in the summer the pool is a fantastic place to chill out. I would definitely recommed this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel to celebrate our 50th wedding anniversary Nov 2011”
Reviews.Author: BijonV
Reviews.Content: My husband and I celebrated our 50th anniversary with our friends at this hotel. We were very impressed with the staff, the room, the breakfast buffet and the view. The desk clerks were very friendly and helpful, recommending great restaurants in the area and arranging free transportation for the six of us to those restaurants. Free internet was available. It is an easy drive to the city and they have a little bus to take us there and returns right to the front door. We stayed there a few days before our cruise and after our Greek Island cruise. I highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A very good place, between business and fun.”
Reviews.Author: Galfons
Reviews.Content: I have been at this hotel for a very short stay, but I could appreciate the room (mid size but clean), the location (not to far from Ataturk Airport but far enough not to be disturbed by airplanes) and the extremely useful minibus (free) from-to the city center: this let me pay a short visit to the old city though having only a few hours free after business and before flight. Really a good compromise, all at all. Only bad news is the cost of limo from/to airport, but you can easily take a taxi and spend half the price.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Carole606
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Novotel on our recent trip to Istanbul. The room was clean - the breakfast buffet ( included) was great, the staff VERY helpful. They arranged free transportation for our group of 6 to go to a different restaurant every night. One desk clerk let me use his personal guide to Istanbul. Free internet in the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Quick stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: The rooms are decent and the staff is courteous although the hotel has a somewhat odd location. There is little located in the vicinity of the Novotel (except the Ibis), but we weren't very far from the Galeria and Carousel malls. The airport is close (which is why we chose this hotel). Look for specials on room rates to improve the value of this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: A wonderful experience for me and my family when we had a few days to do some sightseeing in Istanbul. The service at the cafe where we had breakfast was excellent. Also the service at the reception. Courteous and friendly staff. Also conveniently located to be near the airport. Within 15 mins. And there is available shuttle service by the hotel to go to old city and taksim, Europe side.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: JohnBCambridge Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Ideal for a short break in Istanbul at reasonable cost.Free shuttle works well, but ensure that you book it , as it fills fast.Staff top class, and will do all they can to give good service.Rooms are very clean and confortable, with all basics that are needed.Even though next to a motorway rooms are quiet. Would use again .

Reviews.Title: “I like it”
Reviews.Author: asedki Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: ver nice view and i like the room location was good english is not that good shuttle was great in the city the closet should bigger no entertainment in the hotel breakfast great specially the honey

Reviews.Title: “Extraordinary quality, comfort, safety. Genuinely friendly and attentive staff!”
Reviews.Author: A S
Reviews.Content: Our last night in Istanbul, after a 10night Holy Land Cruise.Very helpful staff with a good command of the english language.Free internet and printer in lobby and business center.Free return shuttle-comfortable, seating up-to-15 passengers to 3 main cities including Bakirkoy, Sultanahmet, and Taksim, several times throughout the day.Did not eat at hotel, nor take in fitness center.Large room, with a queen-size bed and a sofa(bed), tv, desk and free internet access plug-in.Bed was so soft and pillows were fluffy and appreciated! Gorgeous view of Marmara Sea.Our room was facing the construction site, but because it was a national holiday, there was no noise to prevent a peaceful stay.Coffee/tea/cookies available, wine and snacks in minibar/fridge-for-a-fee.Nice size of shower, no absence of hot water with good water pressure.Toilet and shower were separate, making it easier to get ready in AM, as one could shower and the other could use toilet and brush teeth/wash face.Since it was considered winter weather, the a/c would not work, and it got pretty hot in the room when the sun was out.The window opened, but only 1/2 foot wide, probably to prevent birds from flying in, because one nearly did!-well, an attempt was made, despite being on the 11th floor. Only real complaint was the number of kids running around in the lobby, in and out of the front door, and up and down the elevators...pushing all the buttons of every floor, despite getting off at only the 3rd floor. I had the impression that the children 'lived' there.?Maybe their family members worked there...? The security guards at the front door even asked the children in the turkish language to stop running around, but it only slowed them momentarily. Otherwise,an impressive hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A Wonderful Oasis in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: alanisinecuador
Reviews.Content: Our trip to Istanbul started off on the wrong foot with a bad experience at a small, substandard hotel in Sultanahmet. We quickly switched to Novotel, and our experience in Turkey changed 180 degrees. It is located half-way between the airport and Sultanahmet so you have to depend on the hotel's shuttle. It is worth it! The staff was friendly and professional. The breakfast was wonderful. I have nothing negative to say about the experience. In fact, we left Istanbul to tour other parts of Turkey and returned to the same hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, very friendly and helpfull staff”
Reviews.Author: raulrhn
Reviews.Content: Sleep quality- not too good, idle noise could be heard (vent, highway, or other source, I couldn't figure it out) Food- realy good quality and variety Breakfast - same as above Amenities - outdoor swimming pool, indoor sauna, gym, massage. Location - 15 min by bus away from center or airport. Staff friendliness- 10/10: They make a perfect job to feel you're welcome. Tip: free shuttle bus to center or shopping district

Reviews.Title: “attentive to our group”
Reviews.Author: teacup610
Reviews.Content: We stayed here at the beginning and the end of our group tour of Turkey. It was a large group and everyone I spoke to enjoyed this hotel.Our room was spacious, clean and well appointed. The buffet at breakfast was enjoyable(try the honeycomb!)and the dinners were good. They even fixed a late dinner buffet when our plane connection was delayed.Although there doesn't seem to be much in the immediate area,it didn't seem to take too long to get to different sites in town.

Reviews.Title: “Novotel Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Manukay
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel for business travellers. Big rooms and free internet access at reasonable speed.

Reviews.Title: “Good modern hotel for short-term business trips to Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Williamek
Reviews.Content: Novotel is a good modern hotel for short-term business trips to Istanbul. It's located 10 minutes / 30 TLY from the airport so perfect for late flights in. Location: overlooking the Marmara sea so with beautiful views out of the window. But situated right next to a busy 6-lane road so you can forget about romantic walks by the seaside as you won't even be able to cross the road to get there. Transport: As far as I could see you need a taxi to get anywhere from the hotel although there's a free shuttle to the main mosque (Hagia Sophia), which you need to book in advance. Bear in mind that the hotel is south west of Istanbul so if you need to get to a place north east or in the Asian part, getting there will take a while. Stay: Rooms are standard and rather unmemorable but modern and clean. There's free Internet, both wireless and cable. Because of the highway noise don't even try to open the window but airco is good and quiet. Breakfast ok. Fast check in and out. Overall: I like the fact that it's near to the airport and I loved waking up and seeing the sea so I'll come back here again. For business travels it's perfect but for leisure stay I'd go someplace else.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for a short break in Istanbul or Airport Transit”
Reviews.Author: GiuseppeSusan Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: I regularly stay in Accor Group hotels and this Novotel is something special. It is built on the same site as its sister Ibis hotel and the jewel is the central outdoor swimming pool, gym and massage facilities with a nice water view. These made the hotel more of a beach resort than a city hotel. Rooms are the standard novotel layout. Gym and pool are excellent, and the best I have seen in any of the Novotels I have stayed (>20). The big downside is the noisy freeway that separates the hotel from the waterfront. The waterfront is not in use for anything so you cannot walk along it at all. This hotel is locked in by the freeway so if you want to go anywhere you need to get a taxi. They don't even have a suggested outdoor jogging circuit. (but gym has treadmills) Rooms don't have much traffic noise so I slept ok. My room faced the construction site but there was no noise from that either, although they are only at the initial foundations stage of construction. The free shuttle bus is excellent and came in very useful. Just book a spot in advance as it does fill up! Overall I would stay there again for short trips. For longer trips I would perfer something where I could walk to a different restaurant for dinner.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect to enjoy Istanbul touristic attractions and come back to an oasis of relaxation in between”
Reviews.Author: sebastien577
Reviews.Content: My 5 nights stay at Novotel Istanbul was excellent. We were three adults staying in one room and the sofa bed ended up being large and confortable. Reception staff was very young and helpful. Perfect english.The free shuttle bus more than welcome too. What we enjoyed mostly about this hotel is the proximity to airport (15 min drive max and avoid traffic) and the ability to enjoy busy istanbul during the day and come to relax by the pool in between visits.Suthanahmet only 5 min ride by taxi outside of free shuttle service hours and will cost you 7 Euros. Highly recommend this hotel. Only downside would be the price of breakfast. Thanks again for a nice stay,

Reviews.Title: “Good & modern business Hotel”
Reviews.Author: sachinmalik3
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 2 nights during April for a business trip. Its about 15-20 mins drive from the hotel. Rooms have basic amenities and bathroom is neat. Good value for money and free internet is a bonus. Didn't get to have breakfast as had early morning flights on both days but otherwise restaurant was nice for dinner & a casual drink.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel with Water Views”
Reviews.Author: Leylandbros Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: The Novotel Istanbul is a long way fro the main tourists sites. However, the free shuttle bus will take you o the centre of the old city in 20 minutes. However, you must book in for this service, as the shuttle bus is always full for each trip. The rooms are clean, newly renovated. comfortable. The bed was extremely One small problem in the bathrooms - the tiles on the floor before you step into the shower are extremely slippery when wet. Otherwise, we enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good business trip hotel. Great rooms...... Bad location for leisure”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Novotel Istanbul for 4 nights in August 2011 on a business trip. The rooms were well appointed and kept very clean. Had breakfast only once at the hotel as I had to leave for meetings very early, very decent spread for the buffet breakfast. Good value for money. The only downside for me was the fact that the front desk guy at check in told me all their rooms had the sea view but checked me into one that had a view of a construction site, didnt matter much though as I had little time to look out of the window. I recommend this hotel for anyone on a business trip to istanbul. If you are on a holiday, try somewhere closer to the tourist areas as Novotel's location is away from any tourist attraction or the city centre and you would need a taxi to get anywhere. They have a free shuttle bus at specific times of the day but it's a little restrictive given the schedule.

Reviews.Title: “novotel istanbul”
Reviews.Author: romain_schepers
Reviews.Content: This novotel is not far from the airport and also close to the ferry boats to Bursa. From the hotel you have a nice view on the Marmara Sea. The staff is very friendly, rooms are nice and the restaurant is very good with a good service. The view from the fitness room is surprising. They have a free shuttle bus to the Golden Horn ( Blue Mosq ..)

Reviews.Title: “Close to the airport, standard services but staff not very friendly”
Reviews.Author: jefrfa
Reviews.Content: I stayed 3 night at this Novotel hotel close to the aiport, it is functional hotal, nice rooms with king size beds. The terrace with swimming is really very noisy due to proximity with a main road, so not relaxing at all. Staff is not very efficient, nor speaking good English: I have reserved a conference room for a conf call. When I checked in, no information about this conference room: they lost the reservation. Another room was found anyway but and I was 30 minutes late because the phone was not working... no one came rapidely to help me and change it despite I was asking for help... The front desk staff is not friendly at all when it takes to explaining what to visit in the city center. They just do not care.... At the bar, it took them up to 30 minutes to serve 3 coffees... And you may need to repeat sometimes 3 times what you want in English for them to understand. Finally for extra expenses you are asked to give a deposit... So if you are staying at the hotel and having a coca at the bar, beware, you will be asked for credit card deposit... Functional hotel still for business trips

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Makinal
Reviews.Content: We spent our 1 st anniversary in this Hotel , the room was clean and well decorated . The pool was small normally it does not matter for us but the kids in the pool were disgusting and the staff did not warn them . Generally we enjoyed the hotel and made another reservation for next week.

Reviews.Title: “good”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: was good hotel - clean, nice breakfast, it out of the city but still have a great sea view, kinds enjoyed the pool, TV was small -;) staff was nice but didnt extand the check out over all it good, we will stay again

Reviews.Title: “good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Azzouni Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: The hotel is excellent. A little expensive for the quality you are getting. The view from the room was amazing especially the rooms that over look the pool. Kind of difficult to get back to if you miss the entrance.

Reviews.Title: “Istanbul May2011”
Reviews.Author: Anwer
Reviews.Content: Stayed for business trip. Par on better-class hotels. is not a luxury yet, a good place to stay. Staff is social . Rooms are comfortable not spacious and serves good breakfast. Recommended for convenience & proximity to places of interest.

Reviews.Title: “The access problem - solved ?”
Reviews.Author: C-for
Reviews.Content: I have just stayed one night at the Novotel in Istanbul. Required, as there was a â€œonly next dayâ€� connection to Singapore. Taxi (metered) from airport took 15-20 minutes and was 25 Turkish lira (10 euros). Booked this room on WOTIF - and received a lovely â€œexecutiveâ€� room for 130 euros a night. On the 3rd floor with full sea views, queen size bed, smallish plasma TV with many free channels in many languages. The room is spotless. The bathroom is beautifully appointed and water in the shower stunningly hot ! Kettle, tea and coffee, bar fridge, coffee making machine, fridge, safeâ€¦ really all you require for a one night stay. OK - -all reviews on this hotel state that the biggest by far problem is its â€œremotenessâ€�. The â€œcatâ€� wanted to face up to this challenge ! Yes- the hotel is in a very strange location as there is a 6-lane highway almost right at the front door (but the windows in the room block out 95% of that noise very effectively). Most annoyingly â€“ it is impossible to cross this road and get to the lovely footpath and parks on the other side â€“ that run along the sea. There is NO cross-way that I could see for kilometres in either direction ! And NO WAY try to cross this road - - - kamikazes only ! However, to access local shops and restaurants (many shops and many restaurants!) or just to get out for a walkâ€¦ Follow these directions. This may seem complicated but the end product is â€œGreat !â€� and it is only a 20 minute walk : (i) leave the hotel front door and bear left, (ii) there is a narrow (but safe as there is an iron barrier between you and the high way) path that runs 240 metres alongside the highway (not for high-heel wearers), (iii) then that path broadens out to a small road that runs alongside some army base with a high wall (on your left), (iv) walk roughly a further 500 metres and take the very first road on your left, walk up there (with the sea now at your back) to the very top through lots of shops and the 1st restaurant I saw (about 250 metres with a few â€œdoglegs to get round a few cul-de-sacs â€“ but all very obvious), at the top â€“ take a left and you are now walking back in the direction of the hotel on a road parallel to the coast highway, (v) 400 metres along â€“ there is a pedestrian tunnel on your right that goes under the railway station (Zeytinburno), (vi) take that tunnel and it leads you through to the massive amount of quaint little restaurants and shops of Zeytinburno. Beautiful on an early summerâ€™s evening They even have a Burger King ! But also many bakers, baklava, coffee shops, chess cafes, etc. Lovely. Get a taxi back to the Novotel- - for 5 euros max. Happy travels The cat..

Reviews.Title: “Everything ok, but it is cold in the room”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Service is good as well as food quality. Personnel is dedicated to customers. Shuttles to city center are very convenient. But the isolation of the room makes it so cold, even extra blankets are not sufficient to warm-up.

Reviews.Title: “another happy novotel experience”
Reviews.Author: Vecihi
Reviews.Content: Free Internett!!! thanks guys! yes, it's very close to airport and it's near seaside. hotel is clean and staff is friendly. a small problem with the room phone, quickly fixed by the technical staff. sauna and gym is clean and nice enough. price of the hotel could be a bit cheaper due to location. bathroom didnt have dental set but, sure they could bring if i asked (i brought mine already). far to citycenter and shuttle bus is not frequent are the disadvantages. i still definitely suggest especially for business travellers.

Reviews.Title: “Great services”
Reviews.Author: Sbjuliana
Reviews.Content: The hotel has great services, is very comfortable and neat. The sauna and gym are free, as well as the room internet. The rooms are great too, and so is the breakfast. My room had a great view also, and was very silent. The only problem for this hotel is itÂ´s location. ItÂ´s good for being near the airport, but at the same time itÂ´s far away from the touristic sites and the city center. But at least the hotel offers a free shuttle to Sulthanamed (where the Grand Bazar, the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia are) and the Taksim area (good comercial center).

Reviews.Title: “massimo”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: excellent location, confortable rooms, nice service, great breakfast. Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Great Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: It located between Airport and Old city. But guest can use shuttle bus for free. It was good. Nice Breakfast. Nice gym and sauna.

Reviews.Title: “Novotel in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: We liked the hotel a lot. It was clean, staff was friendly, a beautiful view from the windos. So we strongly recomend it.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with great service”
Reviews.Author: Megat_Ishak_11
Reviews.Content: Novotel provided us with a great impression of Turkey when we landed in Istanbul for the first time. The hotel staff were very helpful and efficient, the rooms were clean, well designed successfully mixing modern aesthetics with cozy comfort. My wife and kids loved coming in to the room after a whole day of trekking about Istanbul. As for the facilities there - the free internet access in the mini temp office allowed me to do some office work whilst away from the office, keeping me in touch constantly. As for the food in the main restaurant, it was good and it allowed us to sample the local cuisines there. All in all, this is great hotel. Stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel except for location”
Reviews.Author: Senegeser Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: The shuttle was very helpful in getting us into the main tourist areas, but if you don't want to stick to their schedule, you don't really have any other choice but to take a taxi. You can't really walk anywhere from the hotel because it's on a very busy road with no sidewalks.

Reviews.Title: “this is a very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: shuttle bus to various parts of Istanbul is invaluable as taxis are not cheap and the driving and traffic is insane

Reviews.Title: “Eat, sleep and be happy”
Reviews.Author: LancasterPaul
Reviews.Content: very comfortable hotel, restaurant is excellent, service is friendly, professional and high standard. Be prepared for white-knuckle ride in taxi through Istanbul if you are lucky or a very slow crawl along ugly roads if you are not. The staff efficiently got me a taxi at 6am.

Reviews.Title: “decent rooms but inconvenient location”
Reviews.Author: madisi
Reviews.Content: we had a 3 day business visit to istanbul and decided to stay at the novotel due to it's close location to the airport. it turned out that we needed 5 times more time in traffic as what we've saved from transportation to and from airport. the rooms and service is ok but it took us more than 1 hour to go to downtown. there is only 1 big road into the city and this one is always jammed. if you want to go the heart of the city, better take an autobus and then continue by taxi. atatÃ¼rl international airport is only 10-15 minutes by car.

Reviews.Title: “Remote”
Reviews.Author: uskuhlmans
Reviews.Content: The hotel is just fine but extremely isolated on the edge of a major highway. Walking (carefully) on the edge gets you to a more populated area but no restaurants or other attractions. The hotel offers a free shuttle throughout the day to primary tourist sites but the schedule does limit activities unless you return by taxi. The rooms were nice and the facilities just fine. The breakfast was a substantial buffet of tasty goodies. If one has a car, there is no problem. Otherwise, plan on being at the hotel or racking up some taxi charges.

Reviews.Title: “Bad location, nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: hrefa
Reviews.Content: Novotel is always good quality. This hotel was really the same quality as in Europe the other Novotels. The good things: 1. breakfast - incredible, great range, fruits, breads, soft drinks, omlette, sausage, jam, milk products, etc, what you want! 2. the room - clean, clear, new, nice bathroom, minibar, nice view to the sea, cozy. 3. pool and the garden 4. nice price for this quality of accomandation The bad things: 1. if you are not with car, you can reach this hotel only by taxi or shuttle service. The tram go near of the hotel, but walk by foot is very dangerous for your life. (very thin sidewalk near of heavy traffic, and in the curve the drivers will not see you, dont try to walk there please! MUCH better to pay for a taxi, believe me.)

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel at bad location”
Reviews.Author: kilgore75
Reviews.Content: Novotel Istanbul is perfectly fine hotel. Quite overpriced, but our local partner had a very good deal there. Rooms are clean, hotel well maintained and breakfast is excellent with a lot of choices. The only problem of this hotel is it is little bit far everywhere. There are no restaurants (except the hotel one) or shops around, nothing you can walk to. You may take the hotel shuttle bus to center, but it runs only 3 times a day. Nice hotel if somebody is in Istanbul for work and office is close to Novotel, but not for leisure.

HotelInfo.Name: Novotel Istanbul
HotelInfo.Address: Kazlicesme Mah. Kennedy Cad. | No:56, Istanbul 34025, Turkey
